template.template: Template UBNT UAP - UniFi Controller v5 - passive checks
template.name: Template UBNT UAP - UniFi Controller v5 - passive checks
template.description:
Template for UBNT UniFI Access Point by zbx.sadman@gmail.com
Tested with controller v5.x, Zabbix v 2.4.
https://github.com/zbx-sadman/unifi_proxy
Requirements: UniFi Proxy / UniFi Miner >= v1.3.7&
aptitude install libjson-perl libjson-xs-perl libwww-perl libio-socket-ssl-perl libdata-dumper-simple-perl libtime-hires-perl
aptitude bring a-lot-of-beer

item_prototype.name: [{#SITEDESC}] UAP "{#NAME}" ATF enabled
item_prototype.description:
ATF - Air Time Fairness (?)
Airtime fairness limits the number of clients that can be associated to an AP, and is only recommended in environments with a minimal number of wireless clients per AP.

item_prototype.name: [{#SITEDESC}] UAP "{#NAME}" clients with very good signal
[{#SITEDESC}] UAP "{#NAME}" clients with very low signal
[{#SITEDESC}] UAP "{#NAME}" connected clients
item_prototype.description: Amount of clients (users+guests) connected to UAP

item_prototype.name: [{#SITEDESC}] UAP "{#NAME}" connected clients (MAC)
item_prototype.description: Amount of clients (users+guests) connected to UAP

item_prototype.name: [{#SITEDESC}] UAP "{#NAME}" connected guests
item_prototype.description: Number of guests (clients in guest networks) connected to UAP

item_prototype.name: [{#SITEDESC}] UAP "{#NAME}" connected users
item_prototype.description: Number of users connected to UAP

item_prototype.name: [{#SITEDESC}] UAP "{#NAME}" is available for roll upgrade
[{#SITEDESC}] UAP "{#NAME}" model
item_prototype.description: Model of UAP: BZ2 - UAP BZ2LR - UAP LR ...

item_prototype.name: [{#SITEDESC}] UAP "{#NAME}" need to upgrade
item_prototype.description: "True" if UniFi Controller have new firmware for UAP Key may not exist if no upgrade need

item_prototype.name: [{#SITEDESC}] UAP "{#NAME}" RX drops
item_prototype.description:
rx_dropped; /* no space in linux buffers */
The number of packets dropped during reception.
The bottom line is that the high RX error rate is due to Radio interferences from neighboring Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, Cordless phones, Cellular phones, Speakers, Microwave Ovens, Fans, and even Florescent lamps. If this is happening to your AP, you may want to tweak the Channel, Bluetooth coexistence mode, and dissociate the AP from any sources of interference.

item_prototype.name: [{#SITEDESC}] UAP "{#NAME}" state
[{#SITEDESC}] UAP "{#NAME}" TX drops
item_prototype.description:
tx_dropped; /* no space available in linux */
The number of packets dropped during transmission.

item_prototype.name: [{#SITEDESC}] UAP "{#NAME}" TX retries
item_prototype.description:
Number of times sending frame is retried without considering it a transmission failure.
Data rate is decreased upon failure and frame is sent again. Three sequential failures on lowest supported rate suspend transmission to this destination for the duration of on-fail-retry-time. After that, frame is sent again. The frame is being retransmitted until transmission success, or until client is disconnected after disconnect-timeout.

item_prototype.name: [{#SITEDESC}] UAP "{#NAME}" upgrade to firmware version
item_prototype.description: Firmware version to upgrade Key may not exists if no upgrade need

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template UBNT UAP - UniFi Controller v5 - passive checks:unifi.proxy[get,uap,{#SITENAME},upgradable,{#ID},0].last()}=1
trigger_prototype.name: [{#SITEDESC}] UAP "{#NAME}" firmware is not latest

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template UBNT UAP - UniFi Controller v5 - passive checks:unifi.proxy[get,uap,{#SITENAME},version,{#ID}].change()}=1
trigger_prototype.name: [{#SITEDESC}] UAP "{#NAME}" firmware version is changed

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template UBNT UAP - UniFi Controller v5 - passive checks:unifi.proxy[get,uap,{#SITENAME},state,{#ID}].max(1m)}=0
trigger_prototype.name: [{#SITEDESC}] UAP "{#NAME}" is disconnected > 1 min

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template UBNT UAP - UniFi Controller v5 - passive checks:unifi.proxy[get,uap,{#SITENAME},isolated,{#ID}].min(1m)}=1
trigger_prototype.name: [{#SITEDESC}] UAP "{#NAME}" is isolated > 1 min

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template UBNT UAP - UniFi Controller v5 - passive checks:unifi.proxy[get,uap,{#SITENAME},adopted,{#ID}].max(1m)}=0
trigger_prototype.name: [{#SITEDESC}] UAP "{#NAME}" is not adopted > 1m

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template UBNT UAP - UniFi Controller v5 - passive checks:icmpping[{#IP}].max(#3)}=0
trigger_prototype.name: [{#SITEDESC}] UAP "{#NAME}" is unavailable by ICMP

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template UBNT UAP - UniFi Controller v5 - passive checks:unifi.proxy[get,uap,{#SITENAME},adopted,{#ID}].max(1m)}=0
trigger_prototype.name: [{#SITEDESC}] USW "{#NAME}" is not adopted > 1m
